channel.title: Campaign Advice
channel.description:
So I don't know who has read my latest signature( a lot of people don't read signatures so all good), but I am running for County Commissioner. The guy who is in my region his term is ending and well I am just getting fed up with the bad decisions they are making.
I was always told that the first step to change is your first step. So I am doing that. I plan to enter next week. Any advice before hand for campaigning/after i get into office?

item.title: Campaign Advice
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:7, topic:396579”]Lets see some proof[/quote]What type of proof are you asking for Casey?

I am not sure what thought link brought you to saying that this is a “bull crap thread” so do enlighten me please. If you think it has something to do with age, it isn’t that I am 22. I only have to have some sort of high school diploma as well.

Read full topic

item.description:

casey.:

Lets see some proof

This is Loveandpower; There’s your proof.

item.title: Campaign Advice
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Yeah a lot of the above are items I have a gripe with actually. Even though i can clarify that the county budget for my county is actually made by an elected financial manager the County Commissioners just overlook the dealings of large items.

I do appreciate the list though.

[quote=“Marine5287, post:5, topic:396579”]Good luck bro. Let us know if you make it.[/quote]Will do.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

Good luck bro. Let us know if you make it.

item.title: Campaign Advice
item.dc:creator: @hawkgames hawkgames
item.description:
@hawkgames wrote:

To be honest I have no idea what to say but this should help other people or help you think of some advice of some sort.

8b5fcfc42130bf4c321bca99696f09d0.png915×49

Well heres some ideas.

[ul][li]Sets the yearly property tax rate and approves the budget and employment level for the county;[/li]

[li]Sets commissioners and justice of the peace precinct boundaries;[/li]

[li]Calls, conducts and certifies elections, including bond elections;[/li]

[li]Sets employment and benefit policy;[/li]

[li]Establishes long-range thoroughfare, open space, land use, financial and law enforcement/jail needs plans;[/li]

[li]Acquires property for rights-of-way or other uses determined to be in the public’s best interest;[/li]

[li]Reviews and approve subdivision platting and wastewater treatment for rural areas;[/li]

[li]Provides rural ambulance services and subsidizes rural fire protection;[/li]

[li]Oversees the construction, maintenance and improvement of county roads and bridges;[/li]

[li]Appoints non-elected department heads and standing committees;[/li]

[li]Supervises and controls the county courthouse, county buildings and facilities;[/li]

[li]Adopts a county budget;[/li]

[li]Determines county tax rates;[/li]

[li]Fills vacancies in elective and appointive positions; and
Has exclusive authority to authorize contracts in the name of the county.[/li][/ul]

Read full topic

item.title: Campaign Advice
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

n10si t:

spread rumors abt your opponent’s secret gay affairs

The days have changed, if you said someone was gay an army of gay supporters would swarm vote him in. Same thing happened with obama, only reason he got voted in was he said he would legalize pot and because hes black.
